bigPecks.name: Big Pecks
bigPecks.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Flying-type tiles

blaze.name: Blaze
blaze.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Fire-type tiles

chlorophyll.name: Chlorophyll
chlorophyll.description: For each additional Grass-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

desperation.name: Desperation
desperation.description: Transforms into Gyarados when placed while losing and with 3 or fewer empty spaces remaining

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: Dig in! Boosts all stats by 1 when placed with no cards adjacent

download.name: Download
download.description: Copies the stats and type of the strongest adjacent Pokemon when placed on the grid

evolve.name: Evolve
evolve.description: Evolves into Flareon, Vaporeon, or Jolteon based on the elemental tile it's placed on

familyBond.name: Family Bond
familyBond.description: For each additional member of the Nido family in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

flashFire.name: Flash Fire
flashFire.description: For each additional Fire-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

guts.name: Guts
guts.description: Boosts all stats by 1 when placed adjacent to 2 or more enemy cards

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: While this Pok√©mon waits in your hand, it slowly hardens. For each turn after the game begins, a stat is increased by 1

iceBody.name: Ice Body
iceBody.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Ice-type tiles

keenEye.name: Keen Eye
keenEye.description: For each additional Flying-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

lick.name: Lick
lick.description: Paralyzes adjacent enemies, setting one random stat to 1

lightningRod.name: Lightning Rod
lightningRod.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Electric-type tiles

lonely.name: Lonely
lonely.description: Boosts all stats by 1 when placed with no cards adjacent

magicGuard.name: Magic Guard
magicGuard.description: Inherits the type and stat bonus of any elemental tile it's placed on

magnetPull.name: Magnet Pull
magnetPull.description: Gains 1 stat for each adjacent Pok√©mon

oblivious.name: Oblivious
oblivious.description: Oblivious to its surroundings. Gains 1 to all stats on any elemental tile

overgrow.name: Overgrow
overgrow.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Grass-type tiles

pickup.name: Pickup
pickup.description: Scavenges empty spaces, gaining 1 stat for each vacant adjacent cell

pressure.name: Pressure
pressure.description: Exerts intense pressure on surrounding foes, gaining 1 stat for each adjacent Pok√©mon

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: This Pok√©mon gains 1 stat for every turn it stays in the player's hand after the game starts

selfDestruct.name: Self Destruct
selfDestruct.description: On successful capture, reduces all stats to 1

staticElectricity.name: Static
staticElectricity.description: For each additional Electric-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

swarm.name: Swarm
swarm.description: For each additional Bug-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

swiftSwim.name: Swift Swim
swiftSwim.description: For each additional Water-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

synchronise.name: Synchronise
synchronise.description: For each additional Psychic-type in the current match, a random stat is increased by 1

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.description: Doubles stat bonuses when placed on Water-type tiles

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: Transforms into the strongest adjacent Pokemon when placed on the grid
